full_summary:
**Modernization of Saint-Bernard-de Lacolle Port of Entry**
=============================

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Number:**
WS3870297321

**Issuance Date:**
February 15, 2023

**Closing Date:**
March 22, 2023 (2:00 PM EDT)

**Introduction**
---------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Canada Border Services Agency, invites interested bidders to submit a proposal for the provision of Construction Management Services for the Modernization of Saint-Bernard-de Lacolle Port of Entry. The port of entry is located in Quebec, Canada.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The construction management services required under this RFP include:

*   Project planning and coordination
*   Budgeting and cost control
*   Supplier identification and contract management
*   Compliance with regulatory requirements
*   Coordination with stakeholder groups

**Tender Requirements**
----------------------

*   The tender must be submitted on or before the closing date specified above.
*   All required supporting documentation must be included with the tender.
*   Bids submitted after the closing date will be declared non-responsive.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   Contract duration: 6 years (anticipated start date: not specified, end date: March 31, 2028)
*   Contract type: Construction Management Services
*   Geographic scope: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
*   North American Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
